hero.title: The Most Advanced
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of intelligent note-taking with G-Note AI.
hero.subtitleSecond: Secure, fast, and feature-rich note application with seamless cloud sync and powerful AI assistance for your productivity.

editing.description: Powerful block editor with Markdown and rich media support.

ai.title: AI-First Experience

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Zero server storage. Your data stays in your Drive.

search.title: Universal Search
search.description: Find any note instantly, no matter your library size.

video.title: See G-Note AI in Action
video.subtitle: Watch how G-Note AI transforms your productivity with intelligent features and seamless synchronization.

wallet.title: Elegant & Modern Interface
wallet.subtitle: Experience our intuitive and beautiful interface designed for clarity and speed. Every detail crafted for the perfect writing and organizing experience.
wallet.mainInterfaceDesc: Clean workspace with instant access to all your thoughts
wallet.exploreInterfaceDesc: Summarize, translate, and enhance your notes with AI
wallet.nftInterfaceDesc: Embed images, tables, and rich formatting effortlessly

features.title: Everything You Need in One App
features.subtitle: G-Note AI combines security, powerful editing, and intelligent features to provide the ultimate note-taking experience.

editing.title: Intelligent Editing
editing.description: Write with a powerful block-based editor that supports Markdown, rich text, and integrated media for maximum creativity.

ai.title: AI-First Experience
ai.description: Let AI help you draft, summarize, and refine your thoughts. Transform messy notes into structured insights with a single click.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Zero server storage, encrypted transport, and no third-party tracking. Your intellectual property stays private and secure in your Drive.

search.title: Universal Search
search.description: Instant, powerful search across all your notes. Find any thought or detail the moment you need it, no matter how large your library.

voice.title: Handwriting & Voice
voice.description: Express yourself naturally with built-in drawing tools and voice-to-text input for hands-free note-taking.

ui.title: Modern UI
ui.description: A beautiful, minimalist interface with seamless dark mode and smooth animations designed for focus.

blog.title: Key Features
blog.subtitle: Discover what makes G-Note AI the perfect note-taking companion for modern productivity.

aiAssistant.title: AI-Powered Content Assistant
aiAssistant.excerpt: Transform your writing with intelligent AI assistance. Instantly summarize notes, improve grammar and clarity, translate into 30+ languages, and extract actionable tasks. Change your writing tone to match any context—from professional emails to casual posts. Pay only for what you use with flexible credits, no subscriptions required.

driveSync.title: Google Drive Sync + Offline-First
driveSync.excerpt: Your notes, your control. Stored exclusively in your personal Google Drive—never on third-party servers. Work anywhere with full offline functionality, then sync automatically when online. Intelligent conflict resolution handles edits across multiple devices seamlessly.

collaboration.title: Real-Time Collaboration
collaboration.excerpt: Collaborate effortlessly with peer-to-peer technology. Share a simple 6-digit code and edit together instantly. Built on WebRTC with automatic conflict resolution—changes sync in real-time with zero server delays. Works seamlessly across WiFi, 4G, and 5G networks.

security.title: Security You Can Trust
security.subtitle: Your thoughts are precious. They are protected by Google's infrastructure and our commitment to absolute data privacy.
security.auditedDesc: G-Note AI leverages your personal Google Drive for storage. We never store your raw text on our servers, ensuring you maintain 100% ownership and privacy of your data.

endToEndEncryption.title: Cloud Sync Security
endToEndEncryption.description: Data is synced directly to your Google Drive account, protected by industry-leading OAuth2 authentication.

biometricAuth.title: P2P Collaboration
biometricAuth.description: Real-time collaboration uses direct peer-to-peer connections via WebRTC for secure and fast editing sessions.

hardwareWallet.title: Offline Support
hardwareWallet.description: Full offline capability ensures your notes stay on your device first. Sync occurs ONLY when you go online.

privacyFirst.title: Zero Server Storage
privacyFirst.description: We do not own your data. Your notes live in your Drive, meaning no third-party can access your thoughts.

multiSignature.title: Version History
multiSignature.description: Protect against accidental changes with comprehensive version history to restore previous note states.

decentralizedInfra.title: MIT Open Source
decentralizedInfra.description: Our codebase is transparent and open source, allowing the community to verify our privacy claims.

platforms.title: Available on All Platforms
platforms.subtitle: G-Note AI works seamlessly as a Web App, Chrome Extension, and can be installed on any device as a Desktop or Mobile App.

footer.tagline: The most advanced AI-powered note-taking application for modern thinkers.

seo.title: G-Note AI — Intelligent Note-Taking & AI Productivity
seo.description: G-Note AI is the ultimate AI-powered note-taking app. Secure, private, and synced across all your devices. Transform your ideas into intelligent insights.
seo.keywords: note taking, AI notes, productivity, markdown editor, google drive sync, private notes
